title: 2691 Green Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788363); thin canopy, poor condition, low vigor; will be replaced with just one tree due to minimum distance requirement adjacent to utility infrastructure

title: 380 Market Street
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction (785615); construction of all new canopy entrances along Market Street Bart stations as a part of the BART Market Street Canopies Project (https://www.bart.gov/about/planning/sfentrances); no replacements will be planted, assessed value or standard In-lieu fee (greater of the two values) will be collected

title: 3757 21st Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788337); Cormybia ficifolia is in poor condition, removal associated with a building remodel and new garage; property owner has committed to plant a large stature species replacement, 36in box

title: 535 Laidley Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner contacted BUF due to multiple dropped branches, inspector found many dead branches and decay at main branch union; replacement dependent on underground utilities check

title: 609 Moultrie Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788390); for construction of new house and driveway, tree is in poor condition, has evidence of trunk and root rot; will not be replaced due to narrow sidewalk, property owner will pay in-lieu fee

title: 222 Winfield Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788139); significant tree on private property, advanced decay at base of tree and leaning towards home, has outgrown confined planting space and may be cracking retaining wall; will not be replaced due to space limitations

title: 1056 Carolina Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788351); significant tree growing directly over sewer, gas, and water utilities, home owners have produced bills from two previous sewer repairs citing tree roots as the causal agent; will not be replaced due to multiple utility conflicts

title: 900X Carolina Street (in median)
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction (788327); improvement of Carolina Green Space’s “Skyline Terrace” funded by Community Challenge Grants; trees will be replaced 1:1

title: 39 Santa Rosa Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction (788256); significant tree in footprint of building cannot be replaced by another significant tree, appraised value of $6,200 to be paid; new building will then separately trigger required new street tree planting and/or in-lieu fees

title: 648 Peru Avenue (Peru Avenue Stairway)
Reason(s) for removal: Friends of Peru Avenue community organization will replace trees along with the installation of landscaping funded by Community Challenge Grants, trees will be replaced 1:1

title: 1032-1034 Ashbury Street
district: Tree Removals by Other City Agencies

title: Clarendon Avenue and Dellbrook Avenue Public Hearing Notice - Updated
